The Courage to Heal: A Guide for Women Survivors of Child Sexual Abuse (nke mbụ e bipụtara akwukwo a bu na afo Otu puku nari iteghete na iri asato na asato (1988), ya na mbipụta atọ sochirinụ, nke ikpeazụ bụ mbipụta ncheta afọ iri abuo n'afọ Puku abuo na asato (2008) ) bụ akwụkwọ enyemaka onwe onye site n'aka ndị edemede Ellen Bass na Laura Davis nke lekwasịrị anya na mgbake pụọ na mmetọ mmekọahụ ụmụaka ma a kpọrọ "arụmụka na polarizing".
